name: PGGM
goal: PGGM manages and administers pensions for 2.5 million people in the Netherlands. These people mostly work in the health and care sector. PGGM is a co-operative. As well as aiming to create member value PGGM also invests in projects and assets which have high environmental, social and governance standards.
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
Pension issues: IORP directive
Financial regulation: EMIR, FTT, AIFMD, MiFID, climate policies, sustainable finance
Long term investment and capital markets Union
Supervision on financial markets
